page-find-wallet-desc-2: Wo nnim deɛ sika kotoku yɛ?
page-find-wallet-desc-2-wallets-link: Sua biribi fa sika kotoku ho.
page-find-wallet-description: Sika kotoku de wo ETH sie na ɛma wo tumi de no yɛ adwuma. Wubetumi apaw nneɛma ahorow a ɛbɛfata wo nhuho.
page-find-wallet-last-updated: Daa etwa so a woyɛ no foforo
page-find-wallet-meta-description: Hwehwɛ na fa sisiw Ethereum sika kotoku ho fa features a wohia no so.
page-find-wallet-try-removing: Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wubeyi ade biako anaa abien afi hɔ
page-find-wallet-open-source-desc: Farebae a wɔabue mu 'software' ma obiara susuw application no mudi mu kura ne ahobammɔ ho
page-find-wallet-non-custodial-desc: Sikakorabea ahorow a ɛnhwɛ wo kokoam nsafoa so
page-find-wallet-hardware-wallet-support: Sikakorabea a ebetumi akɔ sikakorabea afidie so ama ahobammɔ a eye
page-find-wallet-rpc-importing-desc: Sika kotoku a ɛboa RPC endpoints a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ no ma ɛne nodes anaa network ahodoɔ di nkitaho
page-find-wallet-nft-support-desc: Sikakorabea a ɛboa ma wohwɛ na wo ne wo NFTs di nkitaho
page-find-wallet-connect-to-dapps: Fa wo ho ka dapps so
page-find-wallet-connect-to-dapps-desc: Wubetumi akɔ application ahorow a ɛboa WalletConnect anaa ɔkwan foforo so
page-find-wallet-staking-desc: Stake ETH tẽẽ fi sika kotoku no mu
page-find-wallet-swaps-desc: Sesa ERC-20 tokens tẽẽ wɔ sika kotoku no mu
page-find-wallet-layer-2-desc: Sika Kotoku a ɛboa Ethereum layer 2s
page-find-wallet-gas-fee-customization: Gas fee a wɔyɛ no sɛnea wɔpɛ
page-find-wallet-gas-fee-customization-d: Yɛ wo gas dodow a wopɛ (aseɛ ka, nimpon ka, ne dodow ka)
page-find-wallet-ens-support-desc: Sikakorabea a ɛboa Ethereum Edin Dwumadi (ENS)
page-find-wallet-token-importing: Token a wɔde fi amannɔne ba
page-find-wallet-token-importing-desc: Fa ERC-20 token biara bra sɛ wode bedi dwuma wɔ sika kotoku no mu
page-find-wallet-buy-crypto-desc: Kɔtɔ crypto a fiat wɔ sika kotoku no mu tẽẽ *Hyɛ no nsow: crypto a wobɛtɔ no betumi ayɛ ɔmantam pɔtee bi
page-find-wallet-sell-for-fiat-desc:
Tɔn crypto ma fiat wɔ sikakorabea no mu 
*Hyɛ no nsow: crypto a wobɛtumi ayi hɔ no begyina ɔmantam pɔtee bia so
page-find-wallet-multisig-desc: Sikakorabea a ɛhwehwɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn nsa hyɛ ase pii na ama wɔatumi ayɛ adwuma bi
page-find-wallet-social-recovery-desc: Sika kotoku a ɛma ahwɛfo tumi sesa safoa a wɔde wɔn nsa hyɛ ase ma nyansa apam sika kotoku
page-find-wallet-new-to-crypto-desc: Dwumadifo bere a edi kan a ɔrehwehwɛ sikakorabea efi ase.
page-find-wallet-nfts-desc: Sikakorabea a wɔde wɔn adwene si NFT mmoa so.
page-find-wallet-hodler-desc: Passive token kura a wɔde hardware sika kotoku.
page-find-wallet-finance-desc: Walets a ɛtwe adwene si DeFi apps a wɔtaa de di dwuma so.
page-find-wallet-developer-desc: Sika Kotoku a ɛboa ma wɔyɛ dapps na wɔsɔ hwɛ.
page-find-wallet-footnote-1: Sika kotoku a wɔakyerɛw wɔ kratafa yi so no nyɛ aban mpanyimfo a wɔpene so, na wɔde ama sɛ wɔde bɛma nsɛm nkutoo.
page-find-wallet-footnote-2: Wɔn nkyerɛkyerɛmu no, sika kotoku ho nnwuma no ankasa na ɛde ama.
page-find-wallet-footnote-3: Yɛde nneɛma ka krataafa yi ho a egyina gyinapɛn ahorow a ɛwɔ yɛn nkyerɛwde nhyehyɛe mu so. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ yɛde sika kotoku bi ka ho a, ma asɛm bi susuw ho wɔ GitHub, na ɛwɔ hɔ.
page-find-wallet-empty-results-desc: Sika kotoku biara nni hɔ a ɛne wo gyinapɛn hyia, bɔ mmɔden sɛ wubeyi filter ahorow bi afi hɔ.
